Title: Parker Completes Curtis Instruments Acquisition
Summary: CLEVELAND, September 18, 2025—Parker-Hannifin Corporation (NYSE:PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it has completed its previously announced transaction to acquire Curtis Instruments, Inc. from Rehlko, for approximately $1 billion in cash.

Title: Parker Scheduled to Present at the Morgan Stanley Annual Laguna Conference on September 10 at 10:00 a.m. Pacific Time (1:00 p.m. Eastern Time)
Summary: CLEVELAND, September 4, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it is scheduled to present at the Morgan Stanley Annual Laguna Conference on September 10, 2025 at 10:00 a.m. Pacific time (1:00 p.m. Eastern time). A live webcast of the presentation will be accessible on Parker's investor information website at investors.parker.com and will be archived on the site.

Title: Parker Elects Beth A. Wozniak to its Board of Directors
Summary: CLEVELAND, September 2, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced the election of Beth A. Wozniak to its Board of Directors, effective September 1, 2025.

Title: Parker Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend and Updates Share Repurchase Authorization
Summary: CLEVELAND, August 21, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $1.80 per share of common stock to shareholders of record as of September 2, 2025. The dividend is payable September 12, 2025.

Title: NASA Astronaut Randy “Komrade” Bresnik Presents Silver Snoopy Award to Parker’s Margie Pack
Summary: LEXINGTON, KY, August 14, 2025—The O-Ring & Engineered Seals (OES) Division of Parker Hannifin Corporation, the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that NASA astronaut Randy “Komrade” Bresnik honored Margie Pack with the prestigious Silver Snoopy award at Parker OES headquarters in Lexington, Kentucky. Ms. Pack, who has dedicated 25 years to manufacturing specialized Parker parts for NASA, exemplifies the commitment and excellence celebrated by this honor.

Title: Parker to Announce Fiscal 2025 Fourth Quarter and Full Year Earnings on August 7; Conference Call and Webcast Scheduled for 11 a.m. Eastern
Summary: CLEVELAND, July 31, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it will release its fiscal 2025 fourth quarter and full year earnings before the market opens on Thursday, August 7, 2025, followed by a conference call at 11:00 a.m., Eastern time. During the call, the company will discuss fiscal 2025 fourth quarter and full year results and respond to questions from institutional investors and securities analysts. The conference call will be webcast simultaneously on Parker's investor website at investors.parker.com with an accompanying slide presentation. The webcast will be archived on the site and available for replay later that day.

Title: Parker to Acquire Curtis Instruments, Expanding Electrification Offering
Summary: CLEVELAND, June 30, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE:PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it has agreed to acquire Curtis Instruments, Inc. from Rehlko, for approximately $1 billion in cash. The transaction is subject to customary closing conditions, including receipt of applicable regulatory approvals, and is expected to close by the end of calendar year 2025.

Title: Parker Lord Signs Contract with Turkish Aerospace Industries for Main and Tail Rotor Dampers on T625 Helicopter Program
Summary: PARIS, June 16, 2025—The Parker Lord Noise, Vibration and Harshness (NVH) Division of Parker Hannifin Corporation, the global leader in motion and control technologies, announced at the 2025 Paris Air Show the signing of a significant contract with Turkish Aerospace Industries (TAI) to supply main and tail rotor dampers for the advanced T625 Gökbey multirole helicopter.

Title: Parker Announces Retirement of Filtration Group President Rob Malone, Elects Matt Jacobson as Successor
Summary: CLEVELAND, May 8, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that Robert W. Malone, Vice President and President – Filtration Group, will retire on August 31, 2025, after 12 years of dedicated service to the company.

Title: Parker Increases Quarterly Cash Dividend 10% to $1.80 per Share
Summary: CLEVELAND, April 24, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.80 per share of common stock to shareholders of record as of May 9, 2025. The dividend is payable June 6, 2025. The dividend represents a 10% increase over the previous quarterly cash dividend of $1.63 per common share and will be the 300th consecutive quarterly dividend paid by the company.

Title: Parker to Announce Fiscal 2025 Third Quarter Earnings on May 1; Conference Call and Webcast Scheduled for 11 a.m. Eastern
Summary: CLEVELAND, April 22, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it will release its fiscal 2025 third quarter earnings before the market opens on Thursday, May 1, 2025, followed by a conference call at 11:00 a.m., Eastern time. During the call, the company will discuss fiscal 2025 third quarter results and respond to questions from institutional investors and securities analysts. The conference call will be webcast simultaneously on Parker's investor website at investors.parker.com with an accompanying slide presentation.

Summary: CLEVELAND, March 10, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it is scheduled to present at the Bank of America Global Industrials Conference in London, England on March 19, 2025 at 10:35 a.m. Greenwich Mean Time (6:35 a.m. Eastern Time). Title: Parker’s Fiscal Year 2024 Sustainability Report Highlights Progress to a Better Tomorrow
Summary: CLEVELAND, February 25, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, has released its fiscal year 2024 Sustainability Report. The latest edition highlights how Parker is leading the way to a better tomorrow as its team members enable engineering breakthroughs that advance clean technologies, create efficiencies that reduce emissions and other environmental impacts, take action to keep one another safe and help strengthen their local communities.

Title: Parker Scheduled to Present at Raymond James’ 46th Annual Institutional Investors Conference on March 3, 2025 at 11:35 a.m. Eastern Time
Summary: CLEVELAND, February 24, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it is scheduled to present at Raymond James’ 46th Annual Institutional Investors Conference on March 3, 2025 in Orlando, Florida at 11:35 a.m. Eastern time. A live webcast of the presentation will be accessible on Parker's investor information website at investors.parker.com and will be archived on the site.

Title: Parker Announces Second Certified Mobile Electrification Technology Center in North America
Summary: CLEVELAND, February 20, 2025—The Motion Systems Group of Parker Hannifin Corporation, the global leader in motion and control technologies, has launched its second certified Mobile Electrification Technology Center (METC) in North America. This new center is part of a growing global Parker network designed to accelerate the transition to low-carbon mobile equipment operations.

Title: Parker Announces First Certified Mobile Electrification Technology Center in North America
Summary: CLEVELAND, February 19, 2025—The Motion Systems Group of Parker Hannifin Corporation, the global leader in motion and control technologies, has launched its first certified Mobile Electrification Technology Center (METC) in North America. This new center is part of a growing global Parker network designed to accelerate the transition to low-carbon mobile equipment operations.

Title: Parker Announces Retirement of EMEA President Joachim Guhe, Appoints Thomas Ottawa as Successor
Summary: CLEVELAND, February 10, 2025—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that Joachim Guhe, President - Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA) Group, will retire after 32 years of dedicated service. Mr. Guhe will step down from his current role on June 30, 2025, but continue with the company until August 31, 2025, to ensure a successful leadership transition.

Title: Parker Completes Divestiture of North America Composites and Fuel Containment Division

Title: Parker Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
Summary: CLEVELAND, October 23, 2024—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $1.63 per share of common stock to shareholders of record as of November 8, 2024. The dividend is payable December 6, 2024.

Title: Parker Aerospace Unveils the Advanced NuCarb® Carbon Brake and Wheel for the Airbus A321neo
Summary: Akron, Ohio, October 22, 2024—Parker Aerospace, a business segment of Parker Hannifin Corporation that includes Parker Meggitt, has announced the development of a new wheel and brake technology designed for use on the Airbus A321neo. This innovative solution, employing the NuCarb® carbon brake and wheel, aligns with Parker’s commitment to delivering cutting-edge solutions for the future of the aviation industry.

Title: Parker to Announce Fiscal 2025 First Quarter Earnings on October 31; Conference Call and Webcast Scheduled for 11 a.m. Eastern
Summary: CLEVELAND, October 21, 2024—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it will release its fiscal 2025 first quarter earnings before the market opens on Thursday, October 31, 2024, followed by a conference call at 11:00 a.m., Eastern time. The conference call will be webcast simultaneously on Parker's investor website at investors.parker.com with an accompanying slide presentation. The webcast will be archived on the site and available for replay later that day.

Title: Parker Introduces DFplus® Generation IV Proportional Valves for Demanding Industrial Applications
Summary: ELYRIA, Ohio, October 15, 2024—The Hydraulic Valve Systems Division of Parker Hannifin Corporation, the global leader in motion and control technologies, has announced the launch of its DFplus® Generation IV proportional valves. The new valve’s electronics have been fundamentally revised, expanding its communication capabilities and improving connectivity for demanding industrial applications. Mechanical components such as its patented voice coil drive (VCD), the basis for the established performance of the previous generations of DFplus valves, remain largely unchanged.

Title: Parker to Webcast Annual Meeting of Shareholders on October 23 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern
Summary: CLEVELAND, October 16, 2024—Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it will webcast its Annual Meeting of Shareholders, which is scheduled for Wednesday, October 23, 2024, at 9:00 a.m., Eastern time. The webcast will be accessible on Parker's investor information website at investors.parker.com and will be archived on the site for one year.
